DOC.brief_summary: This prospective, randomize, controlled trial will compared cap-assisted water exchange with water exchange in patients undergoing sedated colonoscopy. Investigators test the hypothesis that that cap-assisted water exchange is more efficient and causes a shorter insertion time.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Cap-assisted Water Exchange and Water Exchange in Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing fully sedated colonoscopy performed by the investigators obstructive lesions of the colon massive ascites history of partial colectomy provide written informed consent
